ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Having problems changing billing info
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep, you need to be at Sony s site to change your billing now. Not in game like it used to be. Once you finish updating your billing info, it will let you back
ygData.messageBody:
Yep, you need to be at Sony's site to change your
billing now. Not in game like it used to be.

Once you finish updating your billing info, it will
let you back in the game.

--- Stephanie <emtbstephanie@...> wrote:

> Just updated the game since I haven't played in
> months. i need to
> change my billing info and when i follow the "click
> on account, then
> click on change account, then login" directions, I
> can't even get
> that far. I click on "account" and I get this pop up
> station.com
> website in my browser.
>
> I am about to SCREAM...I can finally get back in
> game and it won't
> let me!
>
>
> Please help.....having major game withdrawals over
> here :(
>
>
>
>
>
